description:
Changed the initial riff to resemble what Andy Summers actually plays. (although not entirely, did not tab out the variations and the very beginning).

Please see source:

Andy Live on the Synchronicity Tour: http://youtu.be/ydLe_Tjcr08
Pretty accurate cover: http://youtu.be/PnV-_SaJVU4

Also added some notes on the effects (seems to be Flanger + Delay initially, no overdrive). Big Muff Pi later on.

Someone else can edit the tab to match what those 2 videos show. (Andy's is pretty clear from 1:20 on).
title: Invisible Sun
